mapper.select: select a.TABLEID, a.RECID, a.SHOWCOLS, a.TITLEWIDTH, a.REMARK, a.ABSOLUTEPOSITION,a.LABLETEXTALIGN from dict_t_singlRecord a, dict_t_model b where a.TABLEID = b.TABLEID and a.tableid = #{tableid}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.RECID, T.CTRLID, DECODE(T.CTRLNAME, '', D.NAME, T.CTRLNAME) CTRLNAME, T.SUPERID, T.ISLEAF, T.LEVELNO, T.ORDERID, T.ISTEXT, T.COLSPAN, T.ROWSPAN, T.TOPROWS, T.TOPGROUPS, T.BORDER, T.LEFTCOLS, T.ISGROUPCTRL, T.ISSHOW FROM DICT_T_SINRECDETAIL T, DICT_T_FACTOR D WHERE RECID = #{recid} AND T.CTRLID = D.COLUMNID(+)) A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DICT_T_FACTOR FACTR WHERE A.CTRLID = FACTR.COLUMNID) OR A.ISGROUPCTRL = '1' ORDER BY ORDERID

select * from (select t.RECID, t.CTRLID, (case t.isleaf when '0' then t.ctrlname when '1' then d.NAME end) CTRLNAME, t.SUPERID, t.ISLEAF, t.LEVELNO, t.ORDERID, t.ISTEXT, decode(t.ISTEXT, '1', '是', '0', '否') SNAME_ISTEXT, t.COLSPAN, t.ROWSPAN, t.LEFTCOLS, t.TOPROWS, t.TOPGROUPS, t.BORDER, t.ISGROUPCTRL, t.ISSHOW, decode(t.ISSHOW, '1', '是', '0', '否') SNAME_ISSHOW from dict_t_sinRecDetail t, dict_t_factor d, dict_t_singlRecord s where t.CTRLID = d.COLUMNID(+) and s.RECID = t.RECID and s.TABLEID=#{tableID} start with t.SUPERID = '0' connect by prior t.CTRLID = t.SUPERID order siblings by t.ORDERID) aa where exists (select 1 from dict_t_factor factr where aa.CTRLID = factr.COLUMNID) or aa.ISGROUPCTRL = '1'
mapper.update: update dict_t_singlRecord set showcols = #{showcols}, titlewidth = #{titlewidth}, ABSOLUTEPOSITION = #{sinrecPosition}, lableTextAlign = #{lableTextAlign} where tableid=#{tableid}
mapper.delete: delete from dict_t_sinRecDetail WHERE RECID = #{RECID} and CTRLID=#{CTRLID}
mapper.update:
update dict_t_sinRecDetail
CTRLNAME = #{CTRLNAME},
ORDERID = #{ORDERID},
ISTEXT = #{ISTEXT},
LEFTCOLS = #{LEFTCOLS},
TOPROWS = #{TOPROWS},
TOPGROUPS = #{TOPGROUPS},
BORDER = #{BORDER},
COLSPAN = #{COLSPAN},
ISGROUPCTRL = #{ISGROUPCTRL},
ROWSPAN = #{ROWSPAN},
ISSHOW = #{ISSHOW}
where RECID = #{RECID} and CTRLID=#{CTRLID}
